description:
Ubuyashiki, the leader of the Demon Slayer Corps, finally appears before Tanjiro. He tells him that he will allow Tanjiro and Nezuko to join the Corps. But the Hashira are unable to accept this decision right away. The Wind Hashira, Shinazugawa Sanemi, slashes his own arm and taunts Nezuko with his blood, trying to get her to show her true colors as a demon.
Source: crunchyroll
